item.description: Some boxes here and there Test Common Box _common_box( body: [none] [content], heading: [none] [content], body_color: [none] [color], body_background: [none] [color], heading_color: [none] [color], heading_background: [none] [color], stretch_to_bottom: false, bottom_box: false, ) --> [content] Column Box column_box( body, ..args ) --> [content] Bottom Box bottom_box( content, text_relative_width: 70%, logo: none, ..args ) --> [content] Bibliography Box bibliography_box( bib_file, text_size: 24pt, title: none, style: "ieee", stretch_to_bottom: false ) --> [content]
This is some very nice documentation

Themes ( "body_color": black, "body_background": white, "heading_color": white, "heading_background": rgb(25, 61, 112), ) Setting a new Theme update_theme(..args) Updating a Theme set_theme( theme: [dict] ) Example Themes uni_fr
